revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F8J007 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/15/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WMTR-164GN |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=baby monitor |fcc_id=K7SF8J007 |ic_id=3623A-F8J007 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=WeMo_Baby.XXX |default_ssid_regex=^WeMo_Baby.[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Baby monitor'''
"WMTR-164GN-MAIN_V03" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :A label with a MAC address ('''08863BF6D4CD''') is on the main board in the FCC photos. :The LED board is silkscreened with "WMTR-164GN-LED_V04". :The microphone board is silkscreened with "WMTR-164GN_MIC_V00".
This device uses a [[Texas Instruments]] [http://www.ti.com/product/pcm2912a PCM2912A] USB audio codec.
The FCC label states the default SSID is '''WeMo_Baby.XXX'''. :This is backup up with some (well, very little) '''WiGLE''' support. :The S/N also states the serial number format... :*'''Digit 1-2:''' Supplier ID (22 = Gemtek) :*'''Digit 3-4:''' Year of manufacture (2012 = 12) :*'''Digit 5-6:''' Week of manufacture (first week of the year = 01) :*'''Digit 7-9:''' Product code :**The first character represents the type of product :***K = Plug Ins Actuators :***L = Plug Ins Sensors :***B = WeMo Bridges :***M = Monitor :**The second character represents the '''Belkin''' product line or country code :**The third character represents the '''Belkin''' version or product type :***If no version information is available, 0 is used :***b = baby, m = microphone :*'''Digit 10-14:''' Unique sequence identifier (hex sequence from 00000 to FFFFF)
[[Category:Internet of things]]
